jingle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to shake small metal things together so that they make a sound, or to make this sound
jingle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a short song used in advertisements
jingle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: the sound of small metal objects being shaken together
jingle.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a short song or tune used in advertisements
jingle.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: He earned a living writing advertising jingles.
